DEMO_504_MSG_010: ́Hola, Señor! What'cha doin' in mi casa?
DEMO_504_MSG_030:
́You've finally returned, Señor! I've been waiting for such a long time!
ā
DEMO_504_MSG_040:
́I'm all ready to go to exact our revenge, Señor! 
Will you allow me assist you again, Anses?
DEMO_504_MSG_050:
́Que?! You are not acting... as I'd expect.
Have you, perhaps, forgotten who I am?Ă
DEMO_504_MSG_060:
́Ay no! But, this is no problemo! 
I've got just the thing to jostle those memories of yours!
ā
DEMO_504_MSG_070:
́Simply hop aboard, amigo! Let us soar the skies once
more, like old times! It was always your favorite!
DEMO_504_MSG_080:
́Atta' boy, mi amigo! I know you'd never forget me, Señor!
ā
DEMO_504_MSG_100:
́Bueno, bueno... let us leave Magma Park, and reconvene up north on Mount Elpis!
ā
DEMO_504_MSG_090:
́Now, Señor... it's time to get you back into the swing of
things. We must fly off and exact our revenge against Mother!
DEMO_504_MSG_110:
́We shall depart from the cliffs of Mount Elpis and fly
our way up to the Core, Señor!
